title: Chicken pasta bake (Saturday night pasta)
description: A wonderfully comforting dish, this can be made ahead and will go down really well with the family. It is certainly my grandchildren’s favourite!
ingredients: 3 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into thin strips roughly the size of your little finger
salt and freshly ground black pepper
750ml/1 pint 6 fl oz hot milk (see tip)
2 large tomatoes, deseeded and cut into small cubes
